summary: A Flax (JAX) neural network model that adapts the Whisper architecture for audio classification, processing raw audio or spectrogram inputs through a Whisper encoder and producing class logits or probabilities via a classification head.
business_intent: Enable developers to integrate highâ€‘performance audio classification (e.g., sound event detection, speech command recognition) into applications, leveraging the Whisper model's representation power within the Flax ecosystem.
